result.arabic_text: وَلَا يَحۡزُنكَ قَوۡلُهُمۡۘ إِنَّ ٱلۡعِزَّةَ لِلَّهِ جَمِيعًاۚ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ
result.translation: 65. Nabiyow ama koros atu farmoyta hinnito iyyaanamih maxcoo kee usun ku Rabbit agleytit haanam koo rookise waytay, diggah duddaa kee baari addunyaay akeeral inkih Yalli lek, usuk ken maxco yaabbi ken taama yaaxigi kinni.
